attributes.action: Make all e-petitions have a 'for' and 'against' option.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: E-petitons perform a useful function but cannot be properly assessed without seeing the proportions 'for' and 'against' the motion. The ratio between the two responses and their totals would have more value than either one. Please support this to make e-petitions  more useful and valuable.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
